Name: A Second Before The War
About the game: When humans have ruined themselves, the war has been started by... animals... Lead the penguins country and save the world in this simple decision-making strategy game. What awaits you in this fascinating game: - A unique campaign that lets you immerse yourself in the game's story - Random event generation system - sabotage, fires, riots - can you handle them? - Sophisticated AI calculation mechanism will not let even the professionals get bored! - Weather conditions - each side's actions are only effective in its own natural zone! How will the polar bears conquer the deserts or the salamanders conquer the North? ICE UNION . Lead an army of penguins and beat everyone else out! SAND ALLIANCE . The treacherous varans and lizards have teamed up to expand their deserts! WORLD ALLIANCE . The pandas never wanted war - but circumstances have decided otherwise! NORTH TRIO . Polar bears had to fight to survive! SOUTHERN BROTHERS . The bloodthirsty fire foxes are the fiercest and strongest in this war. Only by uniting can they be defeated!
